price: آيا نو د جاهليت فيصله غواړي؟ او حال دا چې كوم خلك باوركوي هغوی ته د الله نه ښه حكم بل د چا دى؟
arabic: أَفَحُكۡمَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ يَبۡغُونَۚ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ حُكۡمٗا لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: afaḥuk'ma al-jāhiliyati yabghūna waman aḥsanu mina al-lahi ḥuk'man liqawmin yūqinūna
